name: Crafted_Lockdown_E
display_help: Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%, reduces the recharge time of a power by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}% and increases the hold duration of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}%.
